about_the_game:
The patch adds an additional 60-90 minutes of reading (13k words) to Blankspace, fleshing out what happens after the "fade to black" moments in the story.

Note that this has explicit descriptions, but no explicit images.

It's been created in such a form with the hope that a well written descriptive narrative will spark your imagination better than a few drawn images might.

Please note that if you install this DLC from the Steam client, Steam will auto-launch the game, and the patch won't show as active (because it wasn't downloaded when the game was auto-started). This is just a strange Steam feature, rest assured that if you quit the game, and then restart once the download is complete, it'll work fine.

When the game successfully detects the patch's presence, the words "PATCH ENABLED" will appear in small text in the bottom right corner of the start menu screen after launching the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
The patch offers additional story content including explicit text descriptions of sexual acts. There are no explicit images or additional CGs.

All characters depicted in this game are 18 years of age or older.

name: Blankspace - Additional Text Patch (18+)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP1 and up
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz Pentium 4
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080

short_description: An additional 13k words that show what happens after the "fade to black" moments in the story.
